  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/491</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/491</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Gasos</string>
            <string language="en">Gases</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gase</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Gaz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Gáses</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αέρια</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Col·lecció d'exercicis i problemes sobre els gasos i les lleis que regulen el seu comportament. Consta d'una breu introducció teòrica i un exemple interactiu, problemes amb la seva solució i resolució i exercicis d'autoavaluació.</string>
            <string language="en">A collection of exercises and problems on gases and the laws that regulate their behaviour. It includes a brief theoretical introduction and an interactive example, problems (with the way to solve them and the answers) and self-assessment exercises.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">química</string>
            <string language="en">chemistry</string>
            <string language="es">química</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">exercici</string>
            <string language="en">exercise</string>
            <string language="es">ejercicio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">resolució de problemes</string>
            <string language="en">problem solving</string>
            <string language="es">resolución de problemas</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Ansammlung Übungen und Probleme auf Gasen 
und den Gesetzen, die ihr Verhalten regeln. Es schließt eine 
kurze theoretische Einleitung und ein interaktives Beispiel, Probleme 
(mit der Methode, sie und die Antworten zu lösen) und Selbstbewertung
Übungen ein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une collection d'exercices et problèmes sur les 
gaz et les lois qui règlent leur comportement. Il inclut une 
brève introduction théorique et un exemple interactif, des 
problèmes (avec la voie de résoudre eux et les réponses) et des 
exercices de art de l'auto-portrait-assessment.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma coleção dos exercícios e problemas nos 
gáses e nas leis que regulam seu comportamento. Inclui uma 
introdução teórica breve e um exemplo interativo, problemas (com a 
maneira resolver os e as respostas) e exercícios do self-assessment.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una collezione di esercitazioni e problemi sui 
gas e sulle leggi che regolano il loro comportamento. Include 
una breve introduzione teorica e un esempio interattivo, problemi (con
il modo risolvere loro e le risposte) ed esercitazioni di valutazione 
di se stesso.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια συλλογή των ασκήσεων και προβλήματα στα αέρια και 
τους νόμους που ρυθμίζουν τη συμπεριφορά τους. Περιλαμβάνει 
μια συνοπτική θεωρητική εισαγωγή και ένα διαλογικό παράδειγμα, 
τα προβλήματα (με τον τρόπο να λυθούν αυτοί και οι απαντήσεις) 
και τις ασκήσεις αυτοαξιολόγησης.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Chemie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Übung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lösen von Problemen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">chimie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">exercice</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">résolution des problèmes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">chemistry</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">exercício</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">resolver de problema</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">chimica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">esercitazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">soluzione dei problemi</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">χημεία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">άσκηση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">επίλυση προβλήματος</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
